title: Details
text: OQ, functions testInstalledBasic testInstalledPackages base tools package used check functionality base recommended packages. following 7 checks performed: System test execution via testInstalledBasic("") Base package examples execution via testInstalledPackages(scope="base", types="examples") Base package vignettes execution via testInstalledPackages(scope="base", types="vignettes") Recommended package examples execution via testInstalledPackages(scope="recommended", types="examples") Recommended package vignettes execution via testInstalledPackages(scope="recommended", types="vignettes") Base package tests execution via testInstalledPackages(scope="base", types="tests") Recommended package tests execution via testInstalledPackages(scope="recommended", types="tests") check result package function displayed section PDF report, along error messages encountered execution. case IQ OQ, error captured displayed PDF report, along message indicating check failed.

title: Details
text: following example PDF report generated rqualify()` function, includes results IQ OQ checks, well summary table checks performed outcomes.

title: Introduction to rqualify
text: rqualify function performs following steps: Creates folder tree R-validation/IQ-OQ-TestOutput specified path_save. Installs tinytex necessary LaTeX packages (setup_tinytex=TRUE). Installs pandoc (setup_pandoc=TRUE). Copies R-validation.Rmd R-validation folder. Executes IQ-OQ rendering R-validation.Rmd R-validation.tex. Compiles R-validation.tex R-validation.pdf. IQ-OQ successful, creates R-validation.zip folder R-validation located (create_zip=TRUE). case developing process user-level qualification, file R-validation.Rmd located root directory package validation_r/R-validation.Rmd can used template validation document. Note, viewing Github, R-validation.Rmd file located inst/validation_r/R-validation.Rmd.

title: Introduction to rqualify
text: Install execute qualification code new fresh installation R, prior installing packages, validation may fail. Install validate new minor release R, e.g., upgrading 4.4.3 4.5.1; notice bold numbers indicate minor releases. unwilling install validate new minor release R, e.g., upgrading 4.4.1 4.4.2, validation may fail. running validation second time within R-validation folder, remove rename IQ-OQ-TestOutput subfolder created.

title: Qualify R Installations
text: rqualify package installed, executing validation script simple running function: prompted select folder validation files saved – make sure folder select already include folder named R-validation. Alternately, can specify output folder directly: also option automatically zip results. default, validation successful, R-validation folder zipped file named R-validation.zip. like disable feature, can set create_zip=FALSE call rqualify. See ?rqualify info.

what: Run IQ-OQ on an installation of R software — rqualify
title: Run IQ-OQ on an installation of R software — rqualify
Run IQ-OQ on an installation of R software — rqualify
code: rqualify(   path_save,   setup_tinytex = TRUE,   setup_pandoc = TRUE,   verbose = TRUE,   create_zip = TRUE )

title: Run IQ-OQ on an installation of R software — rqualify
text: path_save Character. Path save R-validation folder. Ensure folder named `R-validation` already exist location. setup_tinytex Logical. TRUE, sets tinytex LaTeX document generation. setup_pandoc Logical. TRUE, sets pandoc document conversion. verbose Logical. TRUE, prints progress messages console. create_zip Logical. TRUE, creates zip file R-validation folder validation.

title: Run IQ-OQ on an installation of R software — rqualify
text: function creates folder named R-validation specified path, sets environment, executes validation process. output validation saved created folder. default, contents R-validation folder zipped validation successful. following steps carried : Create folder tree R-validation/IQ-OQ-TestOutput path_save, selected folder Install tinytex necessary LaTeX packages Install pandoc Copy R-validation.Rmd R-validation folder Execute IQ-OQ rendering R-validation.Rmd R-validation.tex Compile R-validation.tex R-validation.pdf IQ-OQ successful, create R-validation.zip folder R-validation located

title: Initialize environment for IQ-OQ. — rqualify_setup
text: path_save Character. Path 'R-validation' folder created store validation outputs. r_test_path Character. Path folder containing base tests copied 'R-validation/IQ-OQ-TestOutput' directory. setup_tinytex Logical. TRUE, sets tinytex LaTeX document generation. setup_pandoc Logical. TRUE, sets pandoc document conversion. verbose Logical. TRUE, prints progress messages console.

title: Initialize environment for IQ-OQ. — rqualify_setup
